# Capstone Ideas

### 1. Lending Club
  + Question: What information can we use to predict which loans will yield the highest return on investment? Do certain attributes such as loan purpose or grade help us predict returns?
  + Data Source: https://www.lendingclub.com/info/download-data.action
  
### 2. World Happiness Report
  + Question: What factors contribute to a country having a high happiness score? Are there additional factors outside of this dataset that are worth considering for each country (e.g. military spending, education, HDI, weather)?
  + Data Source: https://www.kaggle.com/unsdsn/world-happiness
